title: Ticket #932: Bad string escaping in gahps
description:
Many of the GAHPs don't escape strings in the GAHP protocol correctly. Many don't escape backslash. Some convert \r and \n to a space in addition to escaping them with a backslash.

The GAHP escaping rules are as follows: Backslash, space, carriage-return ('\r') and new-line ('\n') characters that occur within a GAHP argument (in either a request or a result) are preceded by a backslash. All functions that escape GAHP arguments need to be changed to follow this rule.
